description: Secondary/muted text fails WCAG AA across page subtitle, snapshot chip, panel metadata, build summary status line, filter labels, empty table message, fold metadata
backgroundNote: body bg under sl-theme dark; panel gradient composited slightly darker ~#080f1d at mid-point
fixDirection: Add --muted: #909db5 to html[data-theme="dark"] block in sl-theme-css. See also U-01.

description: Nav brand label 'Startup Loop' is near-invisible — fails both normal-text (4.5:1) and non-text (3.0:1) WCAG AA thresholds
fixDirection: Change .sl-brand color from #4b5270 to #7b82a0 in #sl-nav inline style. Light mode already overrides correctly via sl-theme-registry-light.

description: Artifact file path text narrowly fails WCAG AA — 4.17:1 against light artifact card background
fixDirection: Change .artifact-path light override from #6b7a96 to #506070 (≈4.7:1 on #f8f9fd).

description: Mermaid diagram zoom control buttons (+, −, ↺) fail 4.5:1 as interactive text; pass 3.0:1 as non-text controls
note: Buttons have title attributes but no aria-label. Characters are interactive, not decorative.
fixDirection: Add aria-label to each button and treat as non-text controls (3.0:1 passes), OR lighten color to var(--text) for full text compliance.

description: Build summary muted text is near-invisible in light mode — dark semi-transparent gradient composites to a mid-blue-grey background, against which --muted (#5a6b7a) has only 1.68:1
backgroundNote: Computed: rgba(12,24,48,0.62) gradient at 50% stop composited on light body bg #f5f6fa
rootCause: sl-theme-registry-light has no .build-summary override. The dark gradient persists in light mode, creating a medium-dark background that is similar in luminance to the --muted colour.
fixDirection: Add .build-summary { background: #ffffff !important; border-color: #dde0ed !important; } and .build-summary-status, .build-summary-controls label, .build-summary-empty { color: #5a6080 !important; } to sl-theme-registry-light.
